scripts.postinstall: npm run prepare:ganache && npm run gen
scripts.create-ganache: npm run prepare:ganache && graph create gnosis/dfusion --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.create-rinkeby: npm run prepare:rinkeby && graph create gnosis/dfusion-rinkeby --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.create-staging: npm run prepare:mainnet && graph create gnosis/dfusion-staging --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.create-mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && graph create gnosis/dfusion --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy: npm run prepare:ganache && graph deploy gnosis/dfusion --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy-rinkeby: npm run prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy gnosis/dfusion-rinkeby --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-staging: npm run prepare:mainnet && graph deploy gnosis/dfusion-staging --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-mainnet:
cli-confirm "

Are you sure the current version is deployed and tested in staging?" && npm run prepare:mainnet && graph deploy gnosis/dfusion --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
